column5: This is our first listed room in this house. huge master bedroom is completely furnished with comfortable queen size bed, 100inches projector screen with movie system, his and her bathroom plus a huge bath tub, walk in closet. We provide all toiletries. We offer free snacks and coffee/tea. The location is great. Only 13 mins away from the airport. And close to a lot of restaurant and shopping.
column8: Beautiful master bedroom near DFW airport
